title: WATCH:  Taxi passenger feeds driver's 'pet crow'
description: A taxi driver in Ireland brightened this passenger’s day by introducing her to his “pet crow.”

title: WATCH:  Rotating supercell looms over Oklahoma
description: Timelapse footage shows a rotating supercell and prolific lightning near Etowah, Oklahoma, on April 19.

title: Cardinals broadcaster, World Series champ Mike Shannon dies
description: Mike Shannon, a two-time World Series winner and longtime St. Louis Cardinals broadcaster, has died

title: 9 injured by gunfire at South Carolina party now recovering
description: Authorities say masked gunmen fired without warning into a crowd at a late night teen party at a South Carolina park over the weekend and wounded nine people

title: Pope open to helping return Ukrainian children in Russia
description: Pope Francis says the Vatican is willing to help facilitate the return of Ukrainian children taken to Russia during the war

title: Police: Armed man wounded, 2 officers hit but saved by vests
description: Police say an overnight standoff with an armed man in a Philadelphia home ended when he was shot and wounded by officers who had been fired upon and struck by bullets in their protective vests

title: This is how much longer Florida residents will be under threat of tornadoes
description: Severe weather is continuing on the East Coast, bringing more opportunities for tornadoes to form

title: Emergency aid supplies reach Sudan, as fighting sputters on
description: An aircraft carrying eight tons of emergency medical supplies has landed in Sudan to help hospitals devastated by more than two weeks of fighting between forces loyal to rival generals

title: Tornado flips cars, damages homes in coastal Florida city
description: A tornado touched down in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, with 100 mph winds.

title: Authorities: Man who died in prison killed NJ woman in 1984
description: Authorities say DNA evidence proves that the man was responsible for murder.

title: 2 teens killed, 4 hurt in Mississippi house party shooting
description: Police said gunfire broke out at a party in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

title: Manhunt continues for suspect in 'execution-style' shooting that killed 5
description: Authorities are continuing the search for the suspect connected to an "execution-style" shooting that killed five members of the same family in Texas.

title: Man kills 3, self, in dispute among Portuguese pigeon racers
description: Portuguese police say a man fatally shot three other men before turning the gun on himself

title: Congress eyes work rules for millions covered by Medicaid
description: More than half a million of the poorest Americans would be left without health insurance under legislation passed by House Republicans that would require people to work in exchange for health care coverage through Medicaid

title: Roof collapse at house near Ohio State University injures 14
description: Authorities say part of a house collapsed and 14 people were injured near The Ohio State University Saturday evening when people climbed onto a roof that was not designed to hold significant weight

title: WATCH:  Baby convinces mom to give him her pineapple juice by crying
description: He’s got his mom wrapped around his finger.

title: LA fire crews find 1 dead following search for missing plane
description: The Los Angeles Fire Department says one person was found dead following an intensive search for a small airplane that crashed in a foggy area Saturday night

title: 2 dead, 1 injured in shooting at Seattle park
description: Seattle police said they're investigating a shooting at Cal Anderson Park.

title: Press box collapse at West Virginia softball game injures 9
description: A portion of a press box floor has collapsed at a middle school softball tournament in West Virginia

title: California man gets 4 1/2 years for role in US Capitol riot
description: Authorities say Southern California man assaulted police with pepper spray.

title: New Orleans restaurant shooting kills waiter, wounds tourist
description: A shooting outside a well-known New Orleans restaurant has killed an employee.
